name: jj-envrun
description: Execute a command with a specific environment variable from an env file

scripts.test-cli: npm link . && npm run test-cli-help && npm run test-cli-abc && npm run test-cli-xyz && npm run test-cleanup && npm unlink .
scripts.release-patch: npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish

author: JJ Bussert
